0.1.name: wordpress/trilulilu-embed
0.1.description: Trilulilu Embed plugin helps you post all trilulilu.ro file formats on your blog pages in a few easy steps. So for posting a trilulilu media to your blog you shoul simply add the following text to the place you want to post: * [trilu-audio]url[/trilu-audio] * [trilu-video]url[/trilu-video] * [trilu-image]url[/trilu-image] Where the url represents the webpage url showing the video or image or audio that you want to share with your readers.
